turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, but I'm having trouble finding a time that works. I'm really getting frustrated with this whole process.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can definitely help you with that. Could you please provide me with your name and date of birth to locate your record? Also, what is the purpose of your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's Jane Doe, DOB is 01/15/1978. And it's for my annual checkup. Now, can you tell me, does Dr. Ramirez even have any availability in the next month? I've been trying to book this for ages, and it feels impossible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, Ms. Doe. I see your record. Dr. Ramirez has a few openings. There is an appointment available on October 26th at 10:00 AM. Would that work for you? Alternatively, there's November 8th at 2:30 PM. Let me know which, if either, works best.
